summary: RECALL #17V-285 AFTER FINDING THE AFOREMENTIONED RECALL ON LINE I TOOK MY TRUCK TO SPARKS TOYOTA TO HAVE IT CHECKED THE DEALER INFORMED ME THAT THE REAR DIFFERENTIAL GASKET WAS LEAKING AND WOULD HAVE TO BE REPLACED THEY HAVE HAD MY TRUCK FOR OVER SIXTY DAYS AND CANNOT TELL ME WHEN IT WILL BE REPAIRED OTHER THAN MID JUNE WHICH HAS PASSED AND THEN EARLY JULY. I CALLED TOYOTA USA AND THEY COULD NOT GIVE ME ANY INFORMATION OTHER THAN THE DEALER WOULD CALL ME. THE DEALER NEVER CALLED AND MY TRUCK IS STILL THERE.
